property.name: Traits
property.value: Dúnedain. Noble. Ranger.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After Aragorn commits to a quest, spend 1 resource from his resource pool to ready him.

property.value: Noldor. Noble.

property.name: Text
property.value: Action: Pay 1 resource from Gildor Inglorion`s resource pool to choose a player to draw 1 card (Limit once per round.)

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After you play a Dwarf character from your hand, reduce your threat by 1.

property.name: Text
property.value: At the end of the round, discard Gandalf from play.Response: After Gandalf enters play, (choose 1): draw 3 cards, deal 4 damage to 1 enemy in play, or reduce your threat by 5.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Noldor. Noble.

property.name: Text
property.value: At the end of the round, discard Galadriel from play.Response: After you play Galadriel from your hand, search the top 5 cards of your deck for an attachment of cost 3 or less and put it into play. Put the remaining cards back in any order.

property.value: Dwarf. Warrior.

property.name: Text

property.value: Response: After Orophin enters play, return a Silvan ally from your discard pile to your hand.

property.name: Text
property.value: Quest Action: Spend 1 Ê resource to put Bofur into play from your hand, exhausted and commited to a quest. If you quest successfully this phase and Bofur is still in play, return him to your hand.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After you play Fili from your hand during the planning phase, seach your deck for Kili and put him into play under your control. Then shuffle your deck.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After you play Kili from your hand during the planning phase, seach your deck for Fili and put him into play under your control. Then shuffle your deck.

property.value: Response: After Naith Guide enters play, choose a hero. That hero does not exhaust to quest this round.

property.name: Text
property.value: Action: Choose another player. That player gains control of Blue Mountain Trader. Then, the player moves 1 resource from the resource pool of a hero he controls to the resource pool of a hero you control, or Blue Mountain Trader is discarded. (Limit once per round.)

property.name: Traits
property.value: Dwarf. Warrior.

property.value: Forced: At the end of the round, discard Dwarven Sellsword unless the players as a group spend 1 Ì resource.

property.value: Action: Put 1 ally card into play from your hand. At the end of the phase, if that ally is still in play, return it to your hand.

property.value: Response: Cancel the `when revealed` effects of a card that was just revealed from the encounter deck.

property.value: Action: Choose and ready 1 ally card.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After a sentinel character is declared as a defender, it gets +2 Ú for this attack. If this attack deals no damage, ready the defending character.

property.value: Action: Return a Ê card from your discard pile to your hand.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: The Caves of Nibin-Dûm

property.name: Text
property.value: When Revealed: Each player must exhaust a character and discard the top card of his deck, if able. If the printed cost of the discarded card is equal to or higher than the remaining hit points of the exhausted character, discard the exhausted character.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: The Caves of Nibin-Dûm

property.value: When Revealed: The player who controls Cave Torch must choose: Either exhaust Cave Torch, or progress cannot be placed on the quest until the end of the phase. (Progress can still be placed on the active location.)

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: The Caves of Nibin-Dûm

property.name: Text
property.value: When Revealed: The first player attaches Watchful Eyes to one of his heroes. (Counts as a Condition attachment with the text: `Limit 1 per hero. Forced: If attached hero is exhausted at the end of the combat phase, reveal 1 card from the encounter deck and add it to the staging area.`)

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: The Oath

property.name: Text
property.value: Setup: Search the encounter deck for 1 copy of The Eaves of Mirkwood and Goblin Troop. Add The Eaves of Mirkwood to the staging area and set Goblin Troop aside, out of play. Shuffle of the encounter deck.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: The Oath

property.value: Setup: Search the encounter deck for 1 copy of The Eaves of Mirkwood and Goblin Troop. Add The Eaves of Mirkwood to the staging area and set Goblin Troop aside, out of play. Shuffle of the encounter deck.

property.value: The Oath

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: The Oath

property.name: Text
property.value: When Revealed: Each player searches the encounter deck and discard pile for a Forest location and adds it to the staging area. Shuffle the encounter deck. This stage cannot be defeated unless at least 1 copy of Goblin Trail is in the vitory display.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: The Oath

property.name: Text
property.value: When Revealed: The first player adds the set-aside Goblin Troop to the staging area. Each other player searches the encounter deck and discard pile for a Goblin enemy and adds it to the staging area.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: The Oath

property.name: Text
property.value: When Revealed: The first player adds the set-aside Goblin Troop to the staging area. Each other player searches the encounter deck and discard pile for a Goblin enemy and adds it to the staging area.This stage cannot be defeated while Goblin Troop is in play. When this stage is defeated, the heroes discover the trail to the Goblins` secret lair and the players win the game.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: The Caves of Nibin-Dûm

property.name: Text
property.value: Setup: Search the encounter deck for Goblin Chieftain, Cracked Pillar, and Cave Torch. Set Goblin Chieftain and Cracked Pillar aside, out of play. The first player attached Cave Torch to one of his heroes. Shuffle the encounter deck.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: The Caves of Nibin-Dûm

property.name: Text
property.value: Setup: Search the encounter deck for Goblin Chieftain, Cracked Pillar, and Cave Torch. Set Goblin Chieftain and Cracked Pillar aside, out of play. The first player attached Cave Torch to one of his heroes. Shuffle the encounter deck.When Revealed: Each player searches the encounter deck for a different location and adds it to the staging area. Shuffle the encounter deck.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: The Caves of Nibin-Dûm

property.name: Text
property.value: When Revealed: Add Goblin Chieftain to the staging area. Each player searches the encounter deck and discard pile for a different enemy of his choice and adds it to the staging area. Shuffle the encounter deck.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: The Caves of Nibin-Dûm

property.name: Text
property.value: When Revealed: Add Goblin Chieftain to the staging area. Each player searches the encounter deck and discard pile for a different enemy of his choice and adds it to the staging area. Shuffle the encounter deck.During the encounter phase, treat each enemy`s engagement cost as if it were 0.The stage gets +4 quest points for each enemy in play.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: The Caves of Nibin-Dûm

property.name: Text
property.value: When Revealed: Set Goblin Chieftain aside, out of play. Add Cracked Pillar to the staging area.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: The Caves of Nibin-Dûm

property.name: Text
property.value: When Revealed: Set Goblin Chieftain aside, out of play. Add Cracked Pillar to the staging area.Forced: Reveal an additional encounter card during the quest phase.Progress cannot be placed on Cracked Pillar while it is in the staging area.After Cracked Pillar leaves play as an explored location, advance to stage 4A.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: The Caves of Nibin-Dûm

property.name: Text
property.value: When Revealed: Add Goblin Chieftain to the staging area.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: The Caves of Nibin-Dûm

property.name: Text
property.value: When Revealed: Add Goblin Chieftain to the staging area.While there are at least 8 progress tokens on this stage, Goblin Chieftain loses the text: `Cannot take damage.`This stage cannot be defeated while Goblin Chieftain is in play. When this stage is defeated, the heroes rescue the captives, fulfilling their oaths, and the players win the game!
